title: 620. Jeremy Chinn on Core Traits Needed at Safety & Linebacker
itunes:title: 620. Jeremy Chinn on Core Traits Needed at Safety & Linebacker
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, DJ shares responses and notes he received from general managers and player personnel directors on the guys' previous discussion on the qualities they would want in a head coach (1:17). After that, Panthers rookie safety Jeremy Chinn joins, as he discusses playing for head coach Matt Rhule, his transition to the NFL and explains the core traits needed at the safety and linebacker position (9:30).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
